profile:
BUR-HAN Â® Garden and Lawn Care is a complete residential, commercial and strata garden and lawn maintenance company serving both residential and commercial clients. Call us today at 604-983-2687 to get a free quote! 

Areas Serviced:
Residential: North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Burnaby, Vancouver & some parts of Coquitlam 
Commercial: North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Burnaby, Vancouver, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Maple Ridge, Whiterock, Surrey, Delta, New Westminster
service_area: Vancouver, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Maple Ridge, and parts New Westminster
products: Strata, Industrial, Retail, and Commercial Clients: All garden care and lawn care maintenance needs, Parking Lot management, Snow Management, Landscaping
services: Lawns: Deep Core Aeration, Fertilization, Organic Weed Control, Lime, Moss Spray, Seed and Soil, Grub Gone, Leaf and Clean-up, Landscape Maintenance, Real Estate Outdoor Make-over as well as projects/installations such as paving stone installation/repair, retaining walls, driveways, pathways, artificial turf, etc.
specialities:
Gardening & Grounds Maintenance,
Lawn Care, 
Project Services : Paving Stones, Retaining Walls, Irrigation, Lighting, Material Installations, etc.

profile:
We provide design | construct | maintenance services from start to finish for any landscape project.  

We create original landscape and garden designs based on the vision and personal style of each client.

Our professionals construct the hardscape, install the plant material, and arrange the proper irrigation and lighting for your space.  We also do extraordinary wood work, architectural concrete, build outdoor living spaces and kitchens,  and create unique fire and water features.

Regular landscape and garden maintenance services keep your garden looking fabulous.  

Our company also provides landscape contracting services and seasonal installations, such as Christmas pots and professional Christmas light installations to enhance your garden space during the winter months.
service_area: All of Vancouver and the north shore.
services: Landscape design, construction, installation, and maintenance.  Irrigation and lighting design, installation, and maintenance.  Custom wood and metal work.  Architectural concrete.
name: Dehaas Landscape Design

profile:
Harp Landscaping has been providing landscaping and gardening services for the last 21 years to the various property management companies and also private homes throughout various areas of the Lower Mainland. Our company is fully insured with WCB and liability insurance to protect our employees and clients. 

Services provided: 
* Strata and commercial maintenance      
* Grass cutting                                              *Soil and bark mulch 
* Gardening                                                
* Yard clean up                                              
* Pruning                                                        
* Hedge and shrubs trimming    
* Weed Control
* New lawn installation 
* Soil and bark mulch 
* Planting
* Aeration
* Power Rake
